article_title: Re: [新聞]病例「指數級成長」1周死亡人數翻倍!譚德塞憂心
author: ryaninscu (小白)
content: 根據B大的時間線做個英文版的好方便大家介紹給國際友人WHO這段時間的豐功偉業: 01/10 WHO advises against any travel or trade restrictions on China http://www.euro.who.int/en/healthtopics/healthemergencies/coronaviruscovid1 9/news/news/2020/01/novelcoronavirusemergesinchina 01/23 WHO says no needyetto declare spread of novel virus is an international emergency https://www.sciencemag.org/news/2020/01/whosaysnoneedyetdeclarespreadnov elvirusinternationalemergency 01/30 WHO calls China coronavirus an international emergency but opposes travel bans https://www.technologyreview.com/f/615123/thechinacoronavirusisofficiallya ninternationalemergency/ 01/31 was first confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January 2020 when two Chinese tourists in Rome tested positive for the virus. One week later an Italian man repatriated back to Italy from the city of Wuhan China was hospitalised and confirmed as the third case in Italy. A cluster of cases was later detected starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February and 60 additional cases and the first deaths on 22 February.By the beginning of March the virus had spread to all regions of Italy. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020_coronavirus_pandemic_in_Italy 02/04 WHO says Wuhan coronavirus outbreak is not yet a pandemic https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/04/health/whocoronavirusnotpandemic/index.html 02/17 WHO urges calm as China virus death toll reaches 2000 Ryan said the outbreak was very serious and could grow but stressed that outside Hubei the epidemic was affecting a very very tiny tiny proportion of people. http://www.digitaljournal.com/news/world/whowarnsagainstvirusoverreaction asdeathtollhits1868/article/567286 02/28 WHO Raises Coronavirus Threat To Very HighBut Not Yet A Pandemic https://www.forbes.com/sites/lisettevoytko/2020/02/28/whoraisescoronavirust hreattoveryhighbutnotyetapandemic/ 72781e1f30 7d 03/02 Pandemic? WHO Notes That Outside China 81% of Coronavirus Cases Are in Just Four Countries https://cnsnews.com/article/international/patrickgoodenough/pandemicwhonote soutsidechina81coronaviruscasesare 03/17 As of 17 March 2020 all countries within Europe had a confirmed case of COVID19 with Montenegro[3] the last European country to report at least one case. In 18 countries at least one death has been reported. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020_coronavirus_pandemic_in_Europe 03/31 WHO stands by recommendation to not wear masks if you are not sick or not caring for someone who is sick https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/30/world/coronaviruswhomasksrecommendationtrnd/ index.html Coronavirus: Does China have enough face masks to meet its needs? https://www.bbc.com/news/worldasiachina51363132 And China bought out all the masks from foreign contries. 03/30 Inside the Australian factory packed with coronavirus supplies being sent to China in disgraceful operation that will cost lives as doctors here are forced to buy painting masks from BUNNINGS https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article8167869/InsideAustralianfactorypack edcoronavirussuppliessentCHINA.html 03/31 As of March 31 2020 the U.S. has the most confirmed active cases in the world and ranks third in the number of total deaths from the virus. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020_coronavirus_pandemic_in_the_United_States 本來就不是給你看的 說了是上一篇的英文版

messages.push_content: 都上色了，不順便翻譯一下？
